title: Archive Attribute Coercion - New
description: Archive Attribute Coercion of received/sent DIMSE

cn.title: Name
cn.description: Arbitrary/Meaningful name of the Archive Attribute Coercion

dicomDescription.title: Attribute Coercion Description
dicomDescription.description: Unconstrained text description of the Attribute Coercion

dcmURI.title: Attribute Coercion URI
dcmURI.description: Identifies Attribute Coercion by Uniform Resource Identifier. Refer values you can set for Attribute Coercion URI field depending on the coercion type.

dcmCoercionSufficient.title: Attribute Coercion Sufficient
dcmCoercionSufficient.description: Do not apply other matching Attribute Coercions of lesser priority, if this Attribute Coercion was applied effectively.

dcmCoercionOnFailure.title: Attribute Coercion on Failure
dcmCoercionOnFailure.description: Behavior on failure applying this Attribute Coercion. Refer Attribute Coercion on Failure meanings.

dcmRulePriority.title: Attribute Coercion Priority
dcmRulePriority.description: Rule Priority. Higher priority rule takes precedence.

dcmDIMSE.title: DIMSE
dcmDIMSE.description: DICOM Message Element on which this Attribute Coercion shall be applied. Also applicable if the requests are received over web.

dicomTransferRole.title: DICOM Transfer Role
dicomTransferRole.description: DICOM Transfer Role of peer DICOM AE.

dcmSOPClass.title: SOP Class UID
dcmSOPClass.description: UID of SOP Class for which this Attribute Coercion shall be applied. Apply on any if absent.

dcmProperty.title: Condition
dcmProperty.description: Conditions in format {key}[!]={value}. Refer applicability, format and some examples.

dcmAttributeUpdatePolicy.title: Attribute Update Policy
dcmAttributeUpdatePolicy.description: Applied Attribute Update Policy. Only effective for coerce from Leading C-FIND SCP coercion type. Refer Attribute Update Policies' meanings.

dcmSupplementFromDeviceReference.title: Device Name Coercion Parameter
dcmSupplementFromDeviceReference.description: Device Name Coercion Parameter. Only effective for supplementing from device coercion type.

dcmMergeAttribute.title: DICOM Attribute Coercion Parameters
dcmMergeAttribute.description: DICOM Attribute Coercion Parameters in format {attributeID}={value}. {attributeID} inside of {value} may be replaced by the value of that attribute in the original dataset. Only effective for merging attributes coercion type. Refer formatting options and examples.

dcmCoercionParam.title: Other Coercion Parameters
dcmCoercionParam.description: Refer applicability to coercion types and examples in Other Attribute Coercion specific Parameters
